organization_info.mission: Delivering innovative technology solutions to drive business transformation

policies.title: Remote Work Policy
policies.description: Guidelines for remote work arrangements, eligibility criteria, and performance expectations.
policies.details: Employees may work remotely up to 3 days per week with manager approval. Remote work eligibility requires 6+ months tenure and satisfactory performance ratings.

policies.title: Vacation and Leave Policy
policies.description: Annual leave, sick leave, and other time-off policies including accrual rates and approval process.
policies.details: Employees accrue 2 weeks vacation in first year, 3 weeks after 2 years, 4 weeks after 5 years. Sick leave is unlimited but requires medical documentation for absences over 3 days.

policies.title: Code of Conduct
policies.description: Professional behavior standards, ethical guidelines, and compliance requirements for all employees.
policies.details: All employees must maintain professional conduct, respect diversity, and report any ethical violations through proper channels.

policies.title: Data Security and Privacy
policies.description: Guidelines for handling confidential information, data protection, and cybersecurity best practices.
policies.details: Employees must use strong passwords, enable 2FA, and never share confidential data outside authorized channels. Regular security training is mandatory.

policies.title: Performance Review Process
policies.description: Annual and quarterly performance review procedures, goal setting, and career development planning.
policies.details: Annual reviews conducted each December with quarterly check-ins. Goals set jointly by employee and manager using SMART criteria.
policies.violations_consequences: Performance improvement plans for poor ratings

training_programs.title: Leadership Development Program
training_programs.description: Comprehensive leadership training covering team management, strategic thinking, and decision-making skills.

training_programs.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Training
training_programs.description: Mandatory annual training on cybersecurity best practices, phishing awareness, and data protection.

training_programs.title: Technical Skills Bootcamp
training_programs.description: Intensive training on latest technologies, frameworks, and development methodologies.
